text: Cameron Eric Brewer (born 8 March 1973) is a New Zealand politician and Member of Parliament representing the Upper Harbour electorate for the National Party since the 2023 New Zealand general election. Prior to entering Parliament, Brewer served as a local government representative in Auckland for nine years. He held two terms as the Auckland Councillor for the Ōrākei Ward and one term as an elected member of the Rodney Local Board, where he was part of the Rodney First ticket. Brewer retired from local government politics in 2019 to focus on his business interests. == References == Category:1973 births Category:New Zealand politicians
title: Cameron Brewer
